import React, { Component } from 'react' import ProductService from '../../../service/product.service' import Container from 'react-bootstrap/Container' import Row from 'react-bootstrap/Row' import Col from 'react-bootstrap/Col' import Button from 'react-bootstrap/Button' import Modal from 'react-bootstrap/Modal' import EditProductForm from '../product-form/EditProductForm' import './ProductDetails.css' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' class ProductDetails extends Component { constructor(props) { super(props) this.state = { modalShow: false } this.productService = new ProductService() } showModal = () => this.setState({ modalShow : true}) hideModal = () => this.setState({ modalShow : true}) getProductInfo() { const id = this.props.match.params.productId this.productService.getProduct(id) .then(response => this.setState(response.data)) .catch(err => console.log(err)) } componentDidMount = () => { this.getProductInfo() } render() { return (

{this.state.name}

Details

  • Category: {this.state.category}
  • Price: {this.state.price}
  • Leather Type: {this.state.leatherType}
 Back ) } } export default ProductDetails
